text: The Mil Mi-38 is a civil and military helicopter. It was designed by the USSR and built in Russia. The Mil Mi-38 is both used for civil and military purposes. The Mil Mi-38 was meant to replace the Mi-8. It flew for the first time on 22 December 2003 and was certified on 30 December 2015. == References == Category:Helicopters Category:Soviet & Russian aircraft
title: Mil Mi-38
